question.title: Vector Sum
question.content:
Given a vector arr[], find the sum of the elements of this vector.

Example :

Input: arr[]= [10, 20, 30]
Output: 60
Explanation: sum is 60(10+20+30).

rephrased.body: Given an array of integers, calculate the sum of its elements.

testcases.explanation: The sum of the elements 10, 20, and 30 is 60.
